import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Patient } from '../interfaces/patient'; import { MessageService } from 'primeng/api'; interface PageEvent { first: number; rows: number; page: number; pageCount: number; } @Component({ selector: 'app-patient', templateUrl: './patient.component.html', styleUrls: ['./patient.component.scss'], providers:[MessageService] }) export class PatientComponent implements OnInit { productDialog: boolean = false; Patients !: Patient[] ; first: number = 0; rows: number = 10; constructor(){ } ngOnInit() { } onPageChange(event: PageEvent) { this.first = event.first; this.rows = event.rows; } openNew() { // this.product = {}; // this.submitted = false; // this.productDialog = true; } }
